ability.name: Blessing of Fate and Destiny
ability.flavor: Your enemies suffer their fate; your allies embrace their destiny!

metadata.flavor: Your enemies suffer their fate; your allies embrace their destiny!
metadata.item_name: Blessing of Fate and Destiny (5 Piety)

effects.effect: You can target yourself instead of one creature with this ability. Choose one of the following effects, which lasts until the end of the encounter or until you are dying: - Whenever a target makes a power roll, they can roll three dice and choose which two rolls to use. - Whenever a target makes a power roll, they must roll three dice and use the lowest two rolls.
